mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AB_DOC ( ID, SEQ, IP, IMG_WID, IMG_HGT, IMG_SRC, IMG_SRC_SIZ, IMG_RSLT, IMG_RSLT_SIZ, SHAPES, IMG_DEC, THUMB_WID, THUMB_HGT, THUMB_SRC, THUMB_SRC_SIZ, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SEQ}, #{IP, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{WID}, #{HGT}, #{IMG_SRC, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{IMG_SRC_SIZ}, #{IMG_RSLT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{IMG_RSLT_SIZ}, #{SHAPES, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{IMG_DEC, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{THUMB_WID}, #{THUMB_HGT}, #{THUMB_SRC, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{THUMB_SRC_SIZ}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') )
mapper.update: UPDATE AB_DOC SET IMG_WID=#{WID}, IMG_HGT=#{HGT}, IMG_SRC=#{IMG_SRC, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMG_SRC_SIZ=#{IMG_SRC_SIZ}, IMG_RSLT=#{IMG_RSLT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMG_RSLT_SIZ=#{IMG_RSLT_SIZ}, SHAPES=#{SHAPES, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMG_DEC=#{IMG_DEC, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, THUMB_WID=#{THUMB_WID}, THUMB_HGT=#{THUMB_HGT}, THUMB_SRC=#{THUMB_SRC, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, THUMB_SRC_SIZ=#{THUMB_SRC_SIZ} WHERE ID=#{ID} AND SEQ=#{SEQ}
mapper.select: SELECT ID, SEQ, IP, IMG_DEC, IMG_WID, IMG_HGT, IMG_SRC_SIZ, IMG_RSLT_SIZ, SHAPES, THUMB_WID, THUMB_HGT, THUMB_SRC_SIZ, REG_DT FROM AB_DOC WHERE ID=#{ID} ORDER BY SEQ
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM AB_DOC WHERE ID=#{ID} AND SEQ>=#{SEQ}
DELETE FROM AB_DOC WHERE ID=#{ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
